note.original: ‘‘jagannāthā pubbabhāge kaṇhātīrantaraṃ sive kaliṅgadeso saṃvutto’’ ityuttadese (thomanidhi)

alternatives.alternative: ‘‘jagannāthā pubbabhāge kaṇhātīrantaraṃ sive kaliṅgadeso saṃvutto’’ ityuttadese

note.original: nagariyo vā pattanaṃ (amara 1.2.1) pakkhe pattanasāhacariyā napuṃsakattaṃ. (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 1.2.1)
rassantā ca, sikhāyaṃ vaḷabhiyaṃ cūḷeti ruddo (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 12.15)

alternatives.alternative: rassantā ca, sikhāyaṃ vaḷabhiyaṃ cūḷeti ruddo

note.previous: gatiyaṃ, to. Pamāṇappakaraṇato vitatañjaliyevāyaṃ kavīhi icchito. Sampuṭañjali panāyaṃ, pasāritasahitā
soce, karaṇe yu, sināne’’ti sattamyantaṃ padaṃ. Dvayaṃ kulyādinā
padānaṃ sandhi vatticchāto, na samāsantaragesū’’ti vuttepi gāthābhāvato chandohānibhayā visandhi. Yattha pana gāthāyampi
visandhi dhammasaṃvaṇṇanāya’ntiādimāhā’’tyādīsu, tattha kathanti? Na samāsantaraṅgesū’’ti imassāniccattā tatthāpi na doso, nena niddiṭṭhamanicca’’nti hi paribhāsitaṃ
Tatrāyaṃ tavānuggatena pavuddho pāsādataravo viya attānañcocchindissatīti saṅkāyaṃ janitāyaṃ snehabhattiñcāpanayati. Abhibhavanañcopādayati
Sattuno vā pakatīhi sandhāya yo tena viggaho, sattuneva vā yo sandhiviggahasamudāyahetuko

note.original: balavatā arinā ucchijjamānassa hīnasattino yaṃ balavadhammavijayisamāsayanaṃ (byākhyāsudhā 1.8.18)

alternatives.alternative: balavatā arinā ucchijjamānassa hīnasattino yaṃ balavadhammavijayisamāsayanaṃ

note.original: pādehi ajati ī, rasso ca padājiṃ (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 18.66)

alternatives.alternative: pādehi ajati ī, rasso ca padājiṃ

note.original: ‘‘yuddhe yodhesu sūresu sahassaṃ katta (khaṇḍa) muddhasu tadāvesā kabandho tu eko’muddhā kriyāndhito’’ti kabandhalakkhaṇaṃ
madaṃ sandate pisodarādi (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 19.43) madaṃ mudaṃ vā sandate… visodarādi (byākhyāsudhāṭīkā)
pasaṃsāyaṃ rūpapaccayo iti subhū (cintāmaṇiṭīkā) pasaṃsāyaṃ rūpaṃ (pāṇini 5.3.66)

note.previous: Dvayaṃ indacālakhye kapaṭe. Mayena asurena sure vañcayituṃ

note.original: manissa jūka (ṇvādi 215) uṇādivuttiyaṃ 4.77 sutte ca passitabbaṃ

note.previous: pana ante tayo ca uttarapadībhūtā, taṃ yathā – tena samo’yaṃ

note.original: amū nibhādayo uttarapadaṭṭhā eva sadisavacanā vāccaliṅgā siyuṃ yathā ‘‘pitunibho putto, mātunibhā kaññā, devanibhama- pacca’’miti, byākhyāsudhā 2.10.37
ucyate ogho uca samavāye ghau nipātanā cassa gho (cintāmaṇiṭīkā 15.39)

alternatives.alternative: ucyate ogho uca samavāye ghau nipātanā cassa gho

note.previous: majjhadīgho. Tiriyalekhāya citaṃ dvijapadehi yuttaṃ, tathā gaṇṭhibhi byāpitaṃ bindubhideva yaṃ ghanatarehi, taṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ. Idañca puthumālināmassāsurassa soṇitamhā eva asurasamaye
